subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Pierre Jackson had a season-high 31 points, and No. 16 Baylor rallied in the second half to beat Boston College, 84-74, in the opening round of the Charleston Classic.
snippet: Pierre Jackson had a season-high 31 points, and No. 16 Baylor rallied in the second half to beat Boston College, 84-74, in the opening round of the Charleston Classic.
